text: After the melancholy theme that you hear up until the three heroes come together ends and this hopeful, heroic version starts... there are just no words. Part of it is nostalgia, but this one makes me feel like crying. Definitely my favorite overworld theme from any of the DQ games.
author: MatrixAndrAIa

text: Honestly, I couldn't agree more. I started playing this game for the first time a few weeks ago (surprisingly, I seemed to overlook this one in the past), and once I heard this in-game, I nearly cried; I was just so happy by it. It's just so perfectly placed and composed, and I love it so much.
